job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: at paypal nasdaq pypl we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships paypal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid available in more than markets around the world the paypal platform including braintree venmo and xoom enables consumers
